tool_description: An API to tell you all the latest news about India from 5 of the most used and trusted news publications.
name: India News Live
title: India News Live

api_list.name: Get News from Indiviual  News Sources
api_list.description:
This will return news about India from a particular news sources mentioned as parameter here.
Please note these is a list of sources you should only mention here - 

1. The Times Of India
2. ndtv
3. Hindustan Times
4. Indian Express
5. News 18
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://india-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/The Times Of India"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "india-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://india-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "india-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all News about India from all the sources
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back latest news about India from the five mentioned sources.
